The 1556 Shaanxi earthquake, or Huaxian earthquake, is the deadliest earthquake in recorded history . It occurred on the morning of 23 January 1556, during the Ming dynasty . According to imperial records, approximately 830,000 people lost their lives . The earthquake was the deadliest ever recorded event in the history of the world . It was the 12th day of the 12 month of the year Jiajing 34 in Chinese calendar, when the earthquake occurred . The quake was magnitude 8.0m (MW) and the depth of the quake was unknown . The area was affected by the earthquake, and the area was largely uninhabited by modern-day Shaanx province .

A magnitude 6.4 earthquake struck in Pishan County, Hotan Prefecture, Xinjiang, China 95 km (59 mi) southeast of Yilkiqi . The earthquake occurred on a blind thrust fault that ruptured but did not reach the surface . Quake killed at least 3 people and wounded 71, including at least three people, in addition to 71 people injured in the July 3, 2015 earthquake . Quake occurred on blind thrust thrust fault, but rupture ceased some 3 to 7 km, beneath the surface of the earth, instead of reaching the surface, causing the earthquake to rupture 3-7 km below the surface and kill 3 people in Xinjiang Province of Xinjiang .

The 2015 Illapel earthquake occurred 46 km (29 mi) offshore from the Coquimbo region, Chile, on September 16 at 19:54:33 Chile Standard Time . The initial quake lasted between three and five minutes; it was followed by several aftershocks greater than magnitude six and two that exceeded 6.0 Mw . 15 fatalities and 6 missing in Chile; 1 fatality and 1 minor injuries in Argentina . 15 people were killed and 6 people were missing; 1 died in Chile and 1 died after the earthquake . 1953 earthquake centered in the southern Ionian Islands in western Greece . The event measured 6.8 on the moment magnitude scale . It raised the whole island of Kefalonia by 60cm (24in) and caused widespread damage . The most destructive was the August 12 earthquake, which killed445–800 . In mid-August there were over 113 recorded earthquakes in the region, and the most destructive of the event was that August 12 . The earthquake was centered near the Ionian islands of the southern Greek island of the Zakyntos region, which was also known as the Great Kefaalonia . It was the first earthquake to hit the region since the 1953 Ionian earthquake .

The 2008 Kyrgyzstan earthquake struck on October 5 at 21:52 local time (15:52 UTC) with a moment magnitude of 6.6 . The center of the earthquake was near the town of Nura, which was destroyed in the quake . The shock destroyed donzens of buildings in the area and destroyed the nearby village of Kura . Minor damage also occurred in nearby Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region . A magnitude 5.7 aftershock in Xinjiang followed the earthquake . Two more aftershocks followed the quake, with a magnitude 5.1 aftershock . The quake was felt throughout Central Asia and was felt in Tajikistan, Tajik and China

The 2016 Imphal earthquake struck northeast India in the state of Manipur on January 4 with a moment magnitude of 6.7 and a maximum Mercalli intensity of VII (Very strong) At least eleven people were killed, 200 others were injured and numerous buildings were damaged . The earthquake hit at 4:35 a.m. on 4 January local time (23:05 UTC, 3 January), was centered in the Tamenglong district; about 30 kmwest of Imphal . The quake was also strongly felt in Bangladesh and extensively felt in eastern and north-eastern India.[5] The earthquake was centered at 24°50′02″N 93°39′22″E

A magnitude 6.9 earthquake struck Myanmar 135 km (84 mi) north-west of Mandalay on April 13, 2016 . It struck at 8:25 local time (13:55 UTC) with a maximum Mercalli intensity of VI (Strong) The estimated depth was 134 km and lasted for around one minute . The tremor was also felt in Bangladesh and India . In India, at least two people lost their lives and more than 70 were reported to have been injured in the tremor . North Maluku Province of Indonesia is one of the most populous provinces in Indonesia . Island in Indonesia is located in the Lesser Sunda Islands chain, with Lombok to the west, Flores to the east, and Sumba further to the southeast . Traditionally, the island is known as the source of sappanwood, as well as honey and sandalwood . Its savanna-like climate and vast grasslanlanlan are characteristic of the island's savanna style . There have been plans by the Indonesian government to split the island off into a separate province of West Nusa Tenggara, but there have been no plans for the split of the province . The 2021 Loyalty Islands earthquake was a 7.7 magnitude earthquake that struck offshore between Vanuatu and New Caledonia . It is currently the 4th largest earthquake of 2021, behind the 2021 South Sandwich Islands earthquake, 2021 Kermadec Islands earthquake and the 2021 Chignik earthquake . The earthquake was located 415 km to the east of the island of New Calingonia in the south of the archipelago . The quake was centered 23°03′04″S 171°39′25″E﻿ / ﻿23.051°S 171.657°E . An earthquake measuring 6.2 magnitude hit Central Italy on 24 August 2016 at 03:36:32 CEST (01:36 UTC) Its epicentre was close to Accumoli, with its hypocentre at a depth of 4.4 km (2.7 mi) The earthquake hit an area near the borders of the Umbria, Lazio, Abruzzo and Marche regions . As of 15 November 2016[update], 299 people had been killed, with 388 injured and 4,500 homeless . The earthquake was recorded at the time of the quake at 42°42′22″N 13°13′23″E﻿ / 42.706

Myanmar is one of the most seismically active regions in the world . Oblique subduction, block rotation, and a transform margin has been responsible for the seismic activities of the country . The Sagaing Fault is one the largest sources of earthquakes in the country, having produced deadly quakes in the past centuries . The Shan Plateau is another source of earthquakes, hosting many active strike-slip faults that accommodate block rotation of the Sunda Plate . The 2004 earthquake was the largest earthquake in Myanmar, with a magnitude of 6.0 magnitude of magnitude 9.0 in the region . Myanmar has also suffered tsunamis, with the 2004 earthquake being the largest tsunami in Myanmar . The country has

Only earthquakes with a magnitude of 6.0 or greater are listed, except for a few that had a moderate impact . Aftershocks are not included, unless they were of great significance or contributed to a death toll, such as the M 6.3 2011 Christchurch earthquake and the M 7.3 aftershock to the 1931 Hawke's Bay earthquake . Earthquakes occur frequently in New Zealand as the country is situated in the collision zone between the Indo-Australian and Pacific tectonic plates, part of the Pacific Basin Ring of Fire, where many earthquakes and volcanoes occur . Most events occur along the main ranges running from Fiord to Fiord, New Zealand's main fault lines .

A magnitude 5.9 earthquake struck Tanzania 27 km (17 mi) east northeast of Nsunga, Kagera Region on September 10 . The shock had a maximum intensity of VII (very strong) Nineteen people were killed and 253 injured in Tanzania, while four people died in Kamuli and seven others were injured in neighbouring Uganda . The 5.9 magnitude earthquake struck near the west of Burundi, Democratic Republic of Congo, at a depth of 40.0 km (24.9 mi) It was the first earthquake to strike in the region since the 1960s . A major avalanche occurred on Gran Sasso d'Italia massif, one of the mountains above Rigopiano in Abruzzo, Italy, on January 18, 2017 . The impact killed twenty-nine people and injured eleven others, making the avalanche the deadliest in Italy since the White Friday avalanche in 1916 . Two causal factors for the avalanche of 2017 include a series of earthquakes that struck the region earlier in the day and the record snowfall which occurr the day before the avalanche . The 2017 Papua New Guinea earthquake was an Mww 7.9 earthquake that struck at 04:30 UTC on 22 January 2017 . Three people were killed during the quake and one was injured . The earthquake was the largest in the history of the world's largest quakes, with a magnitude of 7.3 magnitude (Mww) and a depth of 135 km (84 mi) It was the second largest earthquake in the world in the past year .

Myanmar is one of the most seismically active regions in the world . Oblique subduction, block rotation, and a transform margin has been responsible for the seismic activities of the country . The Sagaing Fault is one the largest sources of earthquakes in the country, having produced deadly quakes in the past centuries . The Shan Plateau is another source of earthquakes, hosting many active strike-slip faults that accommodate block rotation of the Sunda Plate . The 2004 earthquake was the largest earthquake in Myanmar, with a magnitude of 6.0 magnitude of magnitude 9.0 in the region . The Valparaíso Region of central Chile was struck by an earthquake of magnitude 7.8 Mw at 22:03 8 July 1971 local time (03:03 9 July UTC) It had a maximum felt intensity of IX (violent) on the Modified Mercalli intensity scale and caused the deaths of 83 people and injured a further 447 . Central Chile lies on the destructive plate boundary where the Nazca Plate is being subducted beneath the South American Plate . The rate of convergence at this boundary in central Chile is about 74 mm per year . It caused the earthquake to hit the region about 58km (36 mi) and caused a total of 83 deaths in 1971 .

The Philippines lies along the Pacific Ring of Fire, which causes frequent seismic and volcanic activity . Many earthquakes of smaller magnitude occur very regularly due to the meeting of major tectonic plates in the region . The largest was the 1918 Celebes Sea earthquake with Mw8.3.0 . The 1976 Moro Gulf earthquake killed 5,000–8,000 people . Largest earthquake in the Philippines was the 18th-19th-century Celebes Sea quake, the largest in the country, with a magnitude of 8.3 . The country lies on the Pacific Rim of Fire and is located near the Philippines' southern tip of the U.S.-Pacific Ocean .

Skagway, Alaska, is a consolidated city-borough in Alaska, United States . The name of the borough is "Gateway to the Klondike" The area is 9.49 sq mi (24.59 km2) and water 0.05 sq/mi (0.12km2) The city was founded in 1897 and incorporated into a borough in 2007 . The city is the state of Alaska, and the state legislature is currently in charge of the city . The borough is the largest city in Alaska and has a population of 9.45 sq/km2 . The area has land and land rights to the city and is located in Alaska's Aleaskan state .

Taxkorgan is an autonomous county in southwest Xinjiang, China . It is located in Kashgar Prefecture, Xinjiang Prefecture and the seat in Xinjiang . The 893 Ardabil earthquake was a destructive earthquake that struck the city of Ardabil, Iran, on 23 March 893 . The magnitude is unknown, but the death toll was reported to be very large . The USGS, in their "List of Earthquakes with 50,000 or More Deaths", give an estimate that 150,000 were killed, which would make it the ninth deadliest earthquake in history . The Ardabil area is prone to numerous earthquakes and was struck by a major earthquake in 1997 . The event is, in fact, considered to be a "mistaken" earthquake, derived from misreadings of the original Armenian writings about the 893 earthquake in Dvin, Armenia .

Iran is one of the most seismically active countries in the world, being crossed by several major faults that cover at least 90% of the country . The Iranian Plate is bordered by the Indian Plate, the Eurasian Plate, and the Arabian Plate (to the south and west) Since 1900, at least 126,000 fatalities have resulted from earthquakes in Iran . The country is well known for its long history of disastrous earthquake activity . It is also known for the waste of valuable natural resources and the deaths of at least 125,000 people since 1900 . A magnitude 5.9 earthquake struck Tanzania 27 km (17 mi) east northeast of Nsunga, Kagera Region on September 10 . The shock had a maximum intensity of VII (very strong) Nineteen people were killed and 253 injured in Tanzania, while four people died in Kamuli and seven others were injured in neighbouring Uganda . The 5.9 magnitude earthquake struck near the west of Burundi, Democratic Republic of Congo, at a depth of 40.0 km (24.9 mi) It was the first earthquake to strike in the region since the 1960s . The earthquake was the largest in the world, with a magnitude of 5.2 magnitude .

This list includes any notable historical earthquakes that have epicenters within the current boundaries of Turkey . This list is incomplete . Turkey is a seismically active area within the complex zone of collision between the Eurasian Plate and both the African and Arabian Plates . Much of the country lies on the Anatolian Plate, a small plate bounded by two major strike-slip fault zones . The western part of Turkey is also affected by the zone of the North and East Anolian Fault . Seismic hazard is a major concern for the country's geology and geology of the region . Extensive damage was caused on parts of southern Lesbos, where there was one fatality and 10 people were injured . A magnitude 7.5 earthquake struck in the Yucatán Basin of the Caribbean Sea, 44 kilometres (27 mi) east of Great Swan Island off the coast of Honduras . The earthquake was felt across Central America, and rattled windows in Tegucigalpa . No tsunami warnings were issued for certain areas by the U.S. Tsunami Warning Center, but were later cancelled after further monitoring . The quake was also felt in the Cayman Islands, Belize and Guatemala, and was felt in Belmopan, Guatemala and Belize . It was the first major earthquake to strike in the region since the 2010 earthquake in the mid-2000s . No one was injured .

The earthquake was felt in the capital city Caracas and triggered panic among citizens and caused buildings to be evacuated . The region was on heightened alert due to the 2010 Haiti earthquake and although damage was minor there was extensive news coverage of the quake . Kohgiluyeh and Boyer-Ahmad Province is one of the thirty-one provinces of Iran . It is in the south-west of the country, in Iran's Region 2, and its capital is Yasuj . The HonourableHenry Puna is the current Prime Minister of the Cook Islands . He is also the 10th Secretary General of the Pacific Islands Forum . He has served as the 11th Prime Minister . He was succeeded by Meg Taylor in 2010 . The Cook Islands are the most populous and most populous of the islands in the Pacific . They are the largest and most populated of the island chain in the world, with many of the largest economies in the region . An earthquake occurred in northern Afghanistan on 30 May 1998, at 06:22 UTC in the Takhar Province with a moment magnitude of 6.5 and a maximum Mercalli intensity of VII (Very strong) At the time, the Afghan Civil War was underway; the affected area was controlled by the United Islamic Front for the Salvation of Afghanistan (the "Northern Alliance") This earthquake was the second large earthquake in the area in 1998 after another earthquake on February 4 . The earthquake killed 4,000–4,500 people and injured 10,001 people in the region . This list is a list of notable earthquakes that have affected areas within the current boundaries of Azerbaijan . The list includes notable earthquakes in Azerbaijan, including Ganja, Mashtagi, Shamakhi and Baku . The most notable event was the 16th January 1669 earthquake, which lasted for three months and caused severe damage to buildings and roads . No details of damage or information about casualties have been released on this list of quakes in Azerbaijan . Colombia is a seismically active country and has a large seismic risk in many areas of its territory due to its location at the boundaries of the Malpelo, Panama, Caribbean, North Andes and South American Plates along the Pacific Ring of Fire . The southeastern and extreme eastern portions of Colombia are not as seismic active as the rest of the country . The first recorded earthquake felt in Colombia occurred on September 11, 1530, around 10:00 AM, probably with the epicentre near Cumaná, Venezuela. This article is about the earthquake and tsunami that impacted Sulawesi in September 2018 . For the tsunami that followed an eruption of the Anak Krakatau volcano, see 2018 Sunda Strait tsunami . Not to be confused with 2018 West Java earthquake. 2018 earthquake and Tsunami centered in Donggala Regency, Sulawsesi, Indonesia . The quake and tsunami killed 4,340 people and injured 10,679 injured and left millions of people missing . In the long-term, 206,524 people were evacuated from their homes in Indonesia. In the longer term, more than 200,000 people were affected by the earthquake in the longer-term period of December 31, 2018 .

A magnitude 7.3 earthquake struck just off the northern coast of Venezuela, near Cariaco, Sucre, on August 21, 2018 . The earthquake is thought to be the largest in the country since the 1900 San Narciso earthquake . It prompted evacuations in Caracas, and caused shaking in Colombia, Guyana, Brazil, Brazil and Grenada, Dominica, Barbados, St. Vincent and the Grenadines and St. Lucia, and Trinidad and Tobago, the last of which also suffered damage and brief phone and power outages from about 1.5 miles away . Total damage is estimated at $7,000,000 . 5 dead (indirect), 122 injured

Iran is one of the most seismically active countries in the world, being crossed by several major faults that cover at least 90% of the country . The Iranian Plate is bordered by the Indian Plate, the Eurasian Plate, and the Arabian Plate (to the south and west) Since 1900, at least 126,000 fatalities have resulted from earthquakes in Iran . The country is well known for its long history of disastrous earthquake activity . It is also known for the waste of valuable natural resources and the deaths of at least 125,000 people since 1900 . On October 6, 2018, a magnitude 5.9 earthquake struck 19 kilometers northwest of Port-de-Paix, Haiti . The earthquake was the strongest to hit Haiti since January 12, 2010, not including the aftershocks of the 2010 earthquake . The shaking was felt as far away as Port-au-Prince . 18 people were killed and548 were injured in the earthquake, which damaged structures and killed 18 people . The quake is the strongest in Haiti since the 2010 January 12 earthquake, with the strongest since that occurred in January 2010 . A magnitude 7.1 earthquake hit Anchorage, Alaska, on November 30, 2018, at 8:29 a.m. AKST . The earthquake's epicenter was near Point Mackenzie, about 10 miles (16 km) north of Anchorage . It was followed by a magnitude 5.7 aftershock centered 2.5 miles (4.0km) north-northwest of the municipality . Aftershocks were followed by 2,455 (as of January 1 2020)[3] Casualties were117 people and damage to the Glenn Highway in Alaska . The 1999 Ambrym earthquake occurred on November 26 at 00:21:17 local time with a moment magnitude of 7.4 and a maximum Mercalli intensity of VII (Very strong) The back arc thrust event occurred within the Vanuatu archipelago, just to the south of the volcanic island of Ambrymur . The earthquake killed 5–10 people and injured 40–100 people, with a 6.6-m (22-ft) tsunami . The back-arc thrust event was located within the New Hebrides Subduction Zone, previously known as New Hebrares, which is subject to volcanic and earthquake activity because it lies on an active and destructive plate boundary .

Earthquakes in Poland are a rare phenomenon . Natural ones appear in the Carpathian Mountains, Sudetes or in the Trans-European Suture Zone . Most often they are caused by rock bursts in coal or copper mines . The earthquake damaged buildings in Kraków and Wrocław killed 30 people, according to the Jan Długosz chronicle . Other research localised the epicenter to Slovakia, other research has localised it to Slovakianstanstanstania . Natural earthquakes are also felt in Poland, sometimes from other countries, sometimes felt in the country . Earthquakes are rare in Poland and sometimes caused by rocks bursting in coal mines or coal mines .

The 2017 Guatemala earthquake struck near the city of Malacatán in the San Marcos Department, near the Guatemala–Mexico border at 1:29 am local time (UTC−06:00) on June 14 . The Azerbaijan Grand Prix took place on 28 April 2019 at the Baku City Circuit in Baku, Azerbaijan . The race was the 4th round of the 2019 Formula One World Championship . The South American Plate is moving over the Nazca Plate at a rate of 77mm (3.0in) per year . The same process has caused the rise of the Andes mountain range and the creation of the Peru–Chile Trench, as well as volcanism in the Peruvian highlands . The oldest rocks in Peru date to the Precambrian and are more than two billion years old . Along the southern coast, granulite and charnockite shows reworking by an ancient orogeny mountain-building event . The Duke of York Islands are located in East New Britain Province, Papua New Guinea . They are found in St George's Channel between New Britain and New Ireland islands . The islands were named in 1767 by Philip Carteret to honour Prince Edward, son of Frederick, Prince of Wales and younger brother of George III of the United Kingdom . They form part of the Bismarck Archipelago . For the island group in Canada, see Duke of . York Islands for the Canadian island group . The group was named after Prince Edward in the 1767 to honour him and his brother Frederick, Frederick and George III . The 2019 Sunda Strait earthquake occurred on the night of 2 August 2019 . The earthquake struck with a magnitude 6.9 magnitude at a depth of 52.8 kilometres . The epicentre was located 214 km from Bandar Lampung, the capital of Lampung and 147 km west of Sumur, Pandeglang Regency . It was the largest earthquake to have hit Jakarta and West Java in the past . The quake prompted a tsunami warning in the area, with authorities urging coastal residents to immediately evacuate to higher ground . The 2019 Hualien earthquake (Chinese: 418花蓮地震) struck on 18 April at 13:01 local time (05:01 UTC) A moment magnitude 6.1 earthquake hit Taiwan which caused damage to weak buildings and roads in Taipei and other districts . One of the two injured hikers which is identified as from Malaysia later died in local hospital on 28 April as the only fatality in the earthquake, which is the worst since 2018 . Two people were injured while hiking and 15 others were injured in the Taipei area . This was a moment magnitude earthquake 9 kilometres off the coast of Taiwan . The Philippines lies along the Pacific Ring of Fire, which causes frequent seismic and volcanic activity . Many earthquakes of smaller magnitude occur very regularly due to the meeting of major tectonic plates in the region . The largest was the 1918 Celebes Sea earthquake with Mw8.3.0 . The 1976 Moro Gulf earthquake killed 5,000–8,000 people . Largest earthquake in the Philippines was the 18th-19th-century Celebes Sea quake, the largest in the country, with a magnitude of 8.3 . The country lies on the Pacific Rim of Fire and is located near the Philippines' southern tip of the U.S.-Pacific Ocean .

The Samos–İzmir earthquake occurred on 30 October 2020, with a moment magnitude of 7.0, about 14 km (8.7 mi) northeast of the Greek island of Sam . The 1960 Valdivia earthquake was 9.4–9.6 on the moment magnitude scale . It occurred in the afternoon (19:11 GMT, 15:11 local time) and lasted for approximately 10 minutes . The resulting tsunamis affected southern Chile, Hawaii, Japan, the Philippines, and the Philippines . The quake was the most powerful earthquake ever recorded in the history of the Great Chilean earthquake (Gran terremoto de Chile) in 1960 . It was recorded at the time of the earthquake on 22 May 1960 in Valdivia, Chile, Punta Arenas, Iquique, Santiago and Punta Arenas . The earthquake was the largest ever recorded earthquake in the world

The South Shetland Islands are a group of Antarctic islands with a total area of 3,687 km2 . They lie about 120 km (75 mi) north of the Antarctic Peninsula . The 2021 Loyalty Islands earthquake was a 7.7 magnitude earthquake that struck offshore between Vanuatu and New Caledonia . The 2021 South Sandwich Islands earthquakes were a pair of powerful earthquakes, followed by about a thousand strong aftershocks which struck along the South Sandwich Trench in August 2021 . The 2021 Luxian earthquake was a damaging seismic event occurring in the early hours of September 16 at 04:33 China Standard Time . Three people were killed and 146 injured when the earthquake struck Lu County, Luzhou, Sichuan Province . At least 36,800 buildings were affected, 7,800 of them seriously damaged . The surface wave magnitude (Ms ) 6.0 or moment magnitude (Mw m) 5.4 earthquake struck at a shallow depth of 7.5 km .
